content: The term ‘milonguero style tango’ was coined in the early 1990s to describe the style of dancing tango that was prevalent in the milongas of downtown Buenos Aires in the 1950s.
translations: ita:Il termine 'tango stile milonguero' fu coniato nei primi anni '90 per descrivere il modo di ballare il tango che era pre
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by riccioberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
